text: Musara pare tumi ki bani isara'ilera ekati dalake dekhani, yakhana tara baleche nijedera nabira kache ye, amadera jan'ya ekajana badasaha nirdharita kare dina yate amara allahara pathe yud'dha karate pari. Nabi balalena, tomadera prati'o ki emana dharana kara yaya ye, lara'ira hukuma yadi haya, tahale takhana tomara larabe na? Tara balala, amadera ki hayeche ye, amara allahara pathe lara'i karaba na. Athaca amara bitarita hayechi nijedera ghara-bari o santana-santati theke. Atahpara yakhana lara'iyera nirdesa halo, takhana saman'ya kayekajana chara tadera saba'i ghure damralo. Ara allaha taâ€™ala jalemadera bhala kare'i janena.
